contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|theme}} '''Theme''' or '''Themes''' may refer to: {{tocright}} ==Art== * [[Theme (arts)]], the unifying subject or idea of the type of visual work * [[Theme (narrative)]], the unifying subject or idea of a story * [[Theme (music)]], the initial or principal melody in a musical piece * [[Theme music]], signature music which recurs in a film, television program or performance ==Music titles== * [[Theme (album)|''Theme'' (album)]], a 1988 album by Leslie West * [[Themes (Vangelis album)|''Themes'' (Vangelis album)]], 1989 * [[Themes (Clannad album)|''Themes'' (Clannad album)]], 1992 * [[Themes (Silent Stream of Godless Elegy album)|''Themes'' (Silent Stream of Godless Elegy album)]], 2000 * [[Themes (Psychic TV album)|''Themes'' (Psychic TV album)]], 1982 * ''The Theme'', a 2002 song by [[Jurgen Vries]] ==Other uses== * [[Theme (Byzantine district)]], an administrative district in the Byzantine Empire governed by a Strategos * [[Theme (computing)]], a custom graphical appearance for certain software, similar to a graphics skin * [[Theme (linguistics)]], topic * [[Theme (magazine)|''Theme'' (magazine)]] * [[Theme Building]], a landmark building in the Los Angeles International Airport * [[Theme vowel]] or thematic vowel, a vowel placed before the word ending in certain Proto-Indo-European words ==See also== * {{lookfrom}} * {{intitle}} * [[Genre]] * [[Principle]] {{disambiguation}}
